name: Top Monster Truck: Offroad Challenge Race
name_original: Top Monster Truck: Offroad Challenge Race
description:
Jump in the space environment and go fast through terrifying loops. Show your real driving skills and become the pro driver. Race against time, take full speed and do crazy stunts to become daredevil. Have you got what it takes to become the stuntman? If yes then play and perform crazy tricks in space.

Complete the tasks clear the missions and become the world champion. Test your driving expertise and do mad stunts while Use cash to unlock more powerful trucks or to play more exciting missions.
High graphics, 3D space environment and cool animations will make the game best. Interesting and challenging missions, intuitive controls and perfect sound will keep you in game for hours. This simulation does not contain any kind of violence. Does not require any internet connection to play the game. Download this wonderful game from the App Store.

How to Play
• Start the Game
• Tilt to move left/right
• Press break button to slow down
• Touch camera button to change view
• Press nitro to boost your dashing monster truck
Features:
• Very smooth and realistic monster truck control
• Beautiful Space environment
• Wonderful tracks for driving.
